Then, I want to one by one obliterate every pain receptor in her body. That is for being successful. Then I want to pet her brain take the eight hours it has after the body dies before it dies looking at me, and looking at me smiling. That was for keeping her brother mentally broken to the point where he couldn't remember not being mentally broken. And as the light of life fades from her eyes, I will say: it's not enough. Hell isnt enough for the likes of you.

I didn't get hard once while reading this entire series. Want to know why? Any sense of sexiness was instantly blotted out my unfathomable, overwhelming RAGE. Rage at the author for making this, rage at life because I know it's probably happened, and rage at myself because I know I can't stop it from happening. I don't even know why I ever look at anything tagged with blackmail or rape, it all disgusts me. Right now I want to take that blackmailing girl and slowly break every bone in her body, listening to and savoring her cries of agony. That was for thinking about trying to rape her brother. Then, I want to slice her open, while she's alive, and pummel what's left of her bones with a hammer. That was for trying to rape her brother then I want to filé her alive. That was for being successful in her attempt to rape her brother. Then I want to mince her muscles. That is for thinking about mentally breaking her brother. Then I want to rip all her cartilage to shreds. That was for trying

For me, I really love the concept of an yandere, the potential of such an character with such madness within, this ending for this story really gives an impression onto me, myself wanting more from, also loving, this author/artist, an impression which shows me terror and pleasure of what it means to be an yandere in love..

So much "fun", so much pleasure yet there comes a day where you went insane because you lost your chance for an different path and for an different life, just keeping still, hoping that you don't lose the people you love around you and in return, you just had to give in of what has already been done...An end of a "perfect" life with an dear friend..Love holds you at light of start, but your desires becomes you fully when you begun to hold love even deeper within, yourself, without realizing what you really could of done at that point..further creating your possibilities to live and to become..
